import React, {useState} from 'react' import { useLocation, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { Button, Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Card, ListGroupItem} from 'react-bootstrap' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch, useSelector, } from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps' const PlaceOrderScreen = () => { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) //calculate prices cart.itemsPrice = cart.cartItems.reduce( (acc, item) => acc + item.price * item.qty, 0 ) const addDecimals = (num) => { return (Math.round) } cart.shippingPrice = cart.items.Price > 100 ? 0 : 100 cart.taxPrice = Number(( 0.15 * cart.itemsPrice).toFixed(2)) const placeOrederHandler = () => { console.log('items ordered') } return( <>

Shipping

Adress: {cart.shippingAdress.adress}, {cart.shippingAdress.city},{' '}, {cart.shippingAdress.postalCode}{' '}, {cart.shippingAdress.country}

Payment Method

Method: {cart.paymentMethod}

Order Items

{cart.cartItems.length === 0 ? Your cart is empty : (
{cart.cartItems.map((item, index) => ( {item.name} {item.qty} x ${item.price} = ${item.qty * item.price} ))}
) }

Order Summary

 Items ${cart.itemsPrice} Shipping ${cart.shippingPrice} Tax ${cart.taxPrice} Total ${cart.totalPrice} ) } export default PlaceOrderScreen
